channel.title: Magic [Delta]
channel.description:
Yeah I know it's the shitty delta but could anybody help me so the magic has a range of how far it can be casted, and if you're out of range it will run to the npc till it is in range and then begin casting. Please help me with this.
(I want to try to get it to have the same distance allowed as runescape)
